mainText:
R.I.P. Steve Job. You were the greatest inventor in this world. Your products transcend everyone on this planet. I loved your ipod and I will be getting
an iphone 4s to remember you.

The world will miss you. I will miss you. You are an icon and represent the
best of my generation. I shall and always remember your greatness. I am very
sad today to hear you have pass away.

May you go to heaven as it deserve you! and you deserve it.
author: Danny
